page.title: 10MILL WORKERS, CALDER VALE
page.content: Most of the people who work in the Lappet Mill in Calder Vale enjoy their work. They also enjoy working with their friends. The people we interviewed said that they would not like to work anywhere else. We asked some of the workers if they would like to work on a different floor or job. One said that they would like to work in the office but all the others said no. Most of them have worked there 20 to 40 years. We also asked them if most people came from outside and they do, from Garstang and Preston. Most of the people that work on the top floor are from Calder Vale. They all said it was quite hot and dusty, especially in the summer when it is about 80 degrees in there.
